channel.title: My House My Rules
channel.description: This bi-weekly house podcast will take you into the weekend with the hottest new sounds from dance floors worldwide. The best selection of house music including the sounds of Hed Kandi, Defected, Mos, and all the best club hits. It's a great warm up to the weekend and some great tunes for your ipod.
channel.itunes:subtitle: House music radio show
channel.itunes:author: Kenny Grant
channel.itunes:summary: Every Friday at 6:30pm myself and special guests will take you into the weekend with the hottest new sounds from dance floors worldwide. The best selection of house music including the sounds of Hed Kandi, Defected, Mos, and all the best club hits. It's a great warm up to the weekend and some great tunes for your ipod.

item.title: Queen of the North - Kenny Grant
item.dc:creator: Kenny Grant
item.description:
I’m excited to share my latest dj mix titled Queen of the North. It’s a 65 minute mix of deep, soulful, groovin, and jacking house music. Huge thanks to the designers, my little lady, and the podcast subscribers. Hope you enjoy the mix, don’t forget to subscribe to the podcast for free house music. Tracklist below:
01. Fred Everything – Here I Am 02. Bah Samba – Live In The Summer 03. Knee Deep – All About Love 04. Roberto De Carlo – Electric Soul Power 05. Tortured Soul – In My Fantasy 06. Deep City Soul – Groove School 07. Jay West – Love Me Not 08. Johnick – The Return Of The Meatman 09. Kirby and Damien Bailey – I Like it 10. Easily Influenced – Rockit 11. KB Swing – Klets 12. Chris Harris – This Is It 13. John Hawley – Electric Lush 14. D-t3ch – Unseen Things 15. Soydan – Funky Daddy 16. Monoman – Gotta Move 17. The Girth – Nubian Funk 18. Kinky Movement – Two Minute Warning 19. The House Inspectors – Come Back
item.itunes:keywords: queen of the north, fred everything, jackin, house music, jacking house

item.title: Dj Mateo - Cest Tres Bon
item.dc:creator: Kenny Grant
item.description:
Dj Mateo kindly passed on his latest cd titled Cest Tres Bon. It’s a fine selection of french and nu disco house. Hope you enjoy the mix, full tracklisting below:
01. High Fashion: Love (DJ Anonymous Edit) 02. Phoenix - Listzomania (Classixx Remix) 03. Lovebirds – Tuesday 04. David Rubato – Circuit (Aeroplane Remix) 05. Noah and the Whale – Blue Skies (The Twelves Remix) 06 Dj Flipout – Los Hermanos Autotune 07. Damn Arms – Destination (Cassian Remix) 08. Escort – A Bright New Life (Morgan Geist Re-Edit) 09. Magic Fly – 2 Planets 10. Kotey Extra Band (Feat. Chaz Jankel) – Sooner or Later (Chicken Lips Instrumental) 11. Major Lazer – Cash Flow (Classixx Glass Bottom Dub Mix) 12. Claude Von Stroke and Chrisitan Martin Vs Pitbull – Groundhog Day/Girls Gone Wild (Emynd Blend) 13. Alex Gopher – Handguns (Dada Life Remix) 14. Major Lazer – Pon Di Floor (Smoke and Mirrors Edit) 15. Diplo and Laidback Luke – Hey (Original mix) 16. Chelley – Took the Night 17. U-Tern (Feat. Kutcorners) – Disco Sizzurp 18. Turbotito – Liquid Disco 19. Empire of the Sun – Walking on a dream (Treasure Fingers Remix) 20. Ladyhawke – Paris is Burning (Cut Copy Remix) 21. Kris Menace – Metropolis (Night Version)
item.itunes:keywords: dj mateo, mateo, nu disco, cest tres bon, empire of the sun, kris menace, utern, lovebirds, diplo, u-tern, major lazer

item.title: Armand Van Helden - Rise Volume 1 - 1999 mixtape
item.dc:creator: Kenny Grant
item.description:
Stumbled across this dj mix by armand van heldon from 1993. It’s a great flashback on where house music was and where it is today. The mix was titled Rise Volume 1, complete tracklisting below:
01. Mood II Swing I Need Your Luv (Right Now) (Lem’s Church Mix) 02. MAW and Company feat. Xaviera Gold Gonna Get Back To You (Mood II Swing “Big Thick” Dub) 03. Sultans Of Swing Move It To The Left (3rd Level Banji Mix) 04. The S.O.U.L. S.Y.S.T.E.M. It’s Gonna Be A Lovely Day (Palladium House Anthem I) 05. unknown unknown 06. Jazzy Lonely (Underground Goodie Mix) 07. Cajmere feat. Dajae Brighter Days (Underground Goodie Mix) 08. Robin S. Show Me Love (Stonebridge Club Mix) 09. Nightcrawlers Push The Feeling (The Dub Of Doom) 10. T.M.V.S. Don’t Be Shy 11. unknown unknown 12. unknown unknown 13. Martha Wash Carry On (Tee’s Dub) 14. Happyhead Digital Love Thing (Underground MK Mix) 15. Armand Van Helden Te-Quiero (Casa Cabesa Mix) 16. unknown unknown 17. unknown unknown 18. Kenny “Dope” Gonzales All I’m Askin’ (Roger S. Remix) 19. House Of Gypsies Samba 20. Frank Ski Whores In This House 21. Uncanny Alliance I Got My Education (which mix?) 22. Trey Lorenz Photograph Of Mary (MAW Dub) 23. Aly-Us Follow Me (Club Mix) 24. unknown unknown 25. Karen Pollack You Can’t Touch Me (Murk Remix) 26. Liberty City Some Lovin’ 27. Coral Way Chiefs Release Myself
item.itunes:keywords: armand van helden, armand, van heldon, van helden, rise volume 1, armandvanhelden, armand helden, armand van helden

item.title: Nu Disco :: DJ Deadbird - Yacht Funk
item.dc:creator: Kenny Grant
item.description:
My good buddy John (aka dj deadbird) has put together a great mix of nudisco, french and indie house. Yacht funk is a term some are using now to describe a sub-genre in nu-disco/dreamwave that, basically, sounds like music you’d be listening to on a yacht on a sunny day. This is my tribute to summer, friends, and sailing on the ocean. I hope you enjoy the smooth basslines and fun lyrics!
Here is a complete tracklisting:
1. yacht - psychic city 2. the virgins - rich girls 3. pelifics - forever 4. supermal - bigger than big 5. miami horror - make you mine 6. luther vandross - never too much 7. bag raiders - shooting stars 8. the bpa - hes frank feat. iggy pop 9. classixx - ill get you 10. antoine r - brunch 11. cut copy - far away 12. frankmusic - confusion girl 13. boss in drama - favorite song 14. pnau ft. ladyhawke - embrace 15. miami horror - dont be on with her 16. empire of the sun - walking on a dream 17. delorean - deli
item.itunes:keywords: nudisco, nu disco, deadbird, dj deadbird, dead bird, indie, yacht, yacht funk, empire of the sun, classixx, miami horror

item.title: All Bombs - Volume 1
item.dc:creator: Kenny Grant
item.description:
Live Dj mix featuring the biggest club hits from the 2009 summer. This is the first volume/series of 'all bombs' where focus will reside on the biggest cheesey house bombs. Enjoy
Here is a complete tracklisting:
1. Jesse Perez - Conversations (South Beach Mix) 2. The Face - Needin U (DJ Wady Ibiza Mix) 3. Hagenaar Albrecht - In and Out (Original Mix) 4. Lee Cabrera Vs Thomas Gold - Shake It 5. Sandy Rivera and Andy Daniell - Whatever (Andy Daniell Remix) 6. Afrojack - Radioman (Original) 7. Milk and Sugar - Let The Sun Shine (Global_Mix) 8. EDX - Shy Shy (Vocal Mix) 9. Lys - San Francisco Rain (Original Mix) 10. Milk and Sugar - Let The Sun Shine (Global_Mix) 11. Nicola Fasano - 76 Ocean Drive (Apache Vocal Mix) 12. J Nitti - Sunday Morning (Original Mix) 13. Duck Sauce - Anyway (original) 14. Daddys Favourite - Feel Good Things (MHMR mix)
item.itunes:keywords: ibiza house music, ibiza club music, allbombs, all bombs, all house bombs, house bombs, volume 1, house vol 1, allbombs 1

item.title: Classic Daft Punk 1997
item.dc:creator: Kenny Grant
item.description:
Awesome dj mix from legends Daft Punk recorded at Fun Radio station in 1997. Brings back some great memories, enjoy =)
Here is a complete tracklisting: 01. Daft Punk - Da Funk 02. Global communication - The Way 03. I:Cube - Disco Cubizm 04. Basement Jaxx - Fly Life 05. Cheek Venus - Sunshine People 06. Bob Sinclar - Vision Of Paradise 07. Armand van Helden - The Funk Phenomena 08. Parris Mitchell - Ghetto Shout Out 09. Dj Sneak - U Can’t Hide From Your Bud 10. Jedi Knights - Big Knockers 11. Kenlou - What A Sensation 12. DJ Sneak - Disco Erotica 13. Rick Garcia - Somebody Knew 14. Daft Punk - Burnin 15. Fantom - Faithful 16. Ian Pooley - higgledy Piggledy 17. Fast Eddie - Hey Yeah 18. Daft Punk - Phoenix
item.itunes:keywords: Daft Punk, cassius, 1997, french house, daftpunk, sneak, bob sinclar, basement jaxx, armand van heldon, ian pooley, jedi knights

item.title: Ep08: Kenny Grant
item.dc:creator: Kenny Grant
item.description:
New server, new website, and new house music! This mix starts out with some fun feel good house and works into some summer classics.. And ending with an old classic, Danny Tenaglia's remix of Lady.
Here is a complete tracklisting: 01. Dan & Phil - brighter (Ian Pooley Remix) 02. DJ Dealer - whatcha gonna do (Grant Nelson remix) 03. Back to Fundamentals - insatiable (orig studio mix) 04. Bunny Mack - let me love you (dj gregory remix) 05. Mario Fabriani - Caribbean soul 06. Groundholder - do it 4 Da Love 07. Toby Neal - standing tall 08. Waldek Roa - session 1 09. OFS & Oh Dee - give me Love 10. Tom Novy - Your Body (accapella) 11. Joey Negro - Love Hangover (DJ spen remix) 12. Shapeshifters - lolas theme 2008 13. John Dahlback - pyramid 14. Axwell & Dirty South - open your heart (vocal remix) 15. Dj Dlg & Eric Morillo - where are you now 16. Mike Dunn - god made me phunky 17. Modjo - Lady (danny tenaglia remix)
item.itunes:keywords: Mario Fabriani, danny tenaglia, Joey Negro, Shapeshifters, Axwell, Dirty South, DJ Dealer

item.title: Ep05: My House, My Fridays Rule - Feb 09, 2007
item.description: Kenny Grant opens with some quality house and builds into some big room madness. Amaan Hirshee plays the second hour with an awesome selction of upfront tunes. Amaan has releases on blowmedia, gossip, and his productions show no signs of slowing down. More info on amaan at http://www.myspace.com/djhirshee

item.title: Ep04: My House, My Fridays Rule - Jan 12, 2007
item.description: Kenny Grant plays a 30 minute hot mix, followed by Sean Gallagher. Hottest rising superstar dj of Vancouver responsible for one half of playittonight.com Sean has made an awesome deep house mix thats sure to get you groovin. Enjoy =)
